title: PSA: Please don't put spoilers in your thread title.
body: And if you are going to put spoilers in your thread body, please add [SPOILER!] to your thread title.

replies.body: You say this and it's all well and good.... but it only takes one person not doing this to spoil it for you so.... you are probably better off not going to the forums till you have had a chance to watch the games.

> [{quoted}](name=Stillname,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=FBL09IlG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-01T23:37:04.033+0000)
>
> You say this and it's all well and good.... but it only takes one person not doing this to spoil it for you so.... you are probably better off not going to the forums till you have had a chance to watch the games.

I'm not the only one that doesnt want to see spoilers during worlds...

It's a long tournament, you think everyone that doesn't want spoilers should just stay off the boards?  Lol.

How about we have some common courtesy and give people spoiler alerts.

I'm all for it but I really doubt it's going to happen... now you can come here and hope there aren't any spoilers if you want. But someone is bound to put something up if there is an upset at the very least.

Spoiler Alerts: 
The boat sinks
 He is Lukes father
  He was dead the whole time
He killed his wife
   His father dies and he becomes head of the tribe / clan etc etc

But that's how I like my enemy Dairy-us{{champion:122}}  SPOILED....  

:3
